name: Haunted PokeCave
description:
Synopsis : You wake up in a cave infested with Pokemon spirits that lies unrest. And almost all your Pokemon are gone missing. Find your way out of this horror as you venture to rescue all your Pokemon . But the question is, will you be able to find your Pokemon and escape this nightmare? Or will you and your Pokemon be devoured by the spirits during the process?

Hints :

  • Your Pokemon are too scared to fight ghosts. Find a way to identify ghosts and their true form
  • Your Pokemon will die when they lose a battle
  • One of the Pokemon has the ability to teleport you once to the last location you picked up an item, fleeing the battle
The game might contain some bugs. Let me know if you encounter any!

Credits:

  • https://theartificial.com/pokemonicons/ for the awesome free Pokemon icons which were used in the game
  • This awesome theme by TeknoAXE which is used at the end of the game!
  • My good friend realvishwa who supported me in developing the game!
Disclaimer: Pokemon and related content are all rightful property of The Pokémon Company
